markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fey Caller](/Feats.aspx?ID=4735) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 131 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You have learned some of the tricks the fey use to bend primal magic toward illusions and trickery. Add illusory disguise, illusory object, and illusory scene to your spell list, which you cast as primal spells.
name: Fey Caller
